explains: n. 刽子手，死刑执行人

sentences.en: The executioner went off like an arrow.
sentences.cn: 刽子手像离弦之箭一样离开了。

sentences.en: "She's in prison," the Queen said to the executioner, "fetch her here."
sentences.cn: “她在监狱里，”王后对刽子手说，“把她带过来。”

sentences.en: "I'll fetch the executioner myself," said the King eagerly, and he hurried off.
sentences.cn: “我自己去找刽子手来。”国王急切地说，连忙走开了。
